description: Detects logon events that have characteristics of events generated during an attack with KrbRelayUp and the like
name: KrbRelayUp Attack Pattern
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4624" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"3" AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:"Kerberos" AND source.ip:"127.0.0.1" AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserSid:S\-1\-5\-21\-* AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserSid:*\-500)
author: @SBousseaden
Florian Roth
